pr_title: Subscription and Topic Management and Service Version

timeline.message: QueueDescription: Update documentation and set defaults.
Fix test breaks from visibility changes.
Fix build break in integration test.
Adding test cases for deserializing feeds.
Add methods and test for getting subscription.
Add test case for non existent subscription.
Updating default values in Queue and TopicDescription.
Add workaround for invalid DateTimes.MIN returned.
Add test cases for deleting queue and subscription operations.
Add management operations to create queues, topics, and subscriptions with names.
Add test cases for deleting subscription and topic.
Add test case for creating topic.
Add test case for list queues.

timeline.bodyText: Is there a online documentation which we can point user to for list of properties and default values ? More methods below have same comment.
timeline.author: hemanttanwar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -342,48 +792,363 @@
     }
 
     /**
-     * Creates a queue with its context.
+     * Updates a subscription with the given {@link SubscriptionDescription}. The {@link SubscriptionDescription} must
+     * be fully populated as all of the properties are replaced. If a property is not set the service default value is
+     * used.

replies.bodyText:
The likelihood that users click on the documentation first before trying this out and having it fail is low.
There is a @see annotation to each of these methods if they want more complete information.
replies.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: There is a null check when creating the actual subscription object. So this won't happen. I'll remove the double checks.
